name: Charmeleon

passive.name: Fire Spreader
passive.effect: Once per turn, you may generate a Fire Energy. At the end of your turn, put it into your hand.

attacks.name: Flame Breath
attacks.effect: Discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon to use this attack.

flavor: As these lizards grow up, they become more and more aggressive. Villages near a nest pray for rain.
